Label.en: Mr Gustave Eiffel took his name from the German 'Eifel' mountain range, from which his family originally hailed
Label.fr: La famille Bönickhausen venait des montagnes 'Eifel' en Allemagne. Lorsqu'ils ont émigré en France ils ont choisi 'Bönickhausen dit Eiffel' en référence aux montagnes. C'est le nom que portait encore Gustave Eiffel dix ans avant la construction de la tour.

Label.zh: Mr Gustave Eiffel took his name from the German 'Eifel' mountain range, from which his family originally hailed

Label.en: However, he was not actually the tower's designer, as many believe...
Label.fr: Cet ingénieur de génie n'est cependant pas le concepteur de la tour...

Label.en: In reality, he bought the patent from the designers!
